name: Kazuyuki Shudo
content: Kazuyuki Shudo Kazuyuki Shudo Japanese version is here Last-updated: February 9, 2023 Biography (Activity introduction) | Diary (in Japanese) | Publications | Hot list | Photographs (in Japanese) (ã€œ Nov 2007) Search from WWW Search from shudo.net Projects Articles (in Japanese) Performance comparison of JIT compilers Softwares (in Japanese) shuJIT: JavaTM JIT compiler for x86 / Sun Classic VM A button in Java Researches on distributed and parallel processing SimBlock: A Blockchain Network Simulator Overlay Weaver: An Overlay Construction Toolkit P3 (Personal Power Plant): P2P middleware for distributed computing MetaVM: a transparent distributed Java Virtual Machine (supported by shuJIT) MOBA: a Java thread migration system (in Japanese) MC: distributing and parallelizing compiler and runtime system Grid Access Grid, Karaoke Grid Information security Java implementation and evaluation of 128bit block cipher E2 (designed by NTT) E2 was designed by NTT and submitted to NIST as a candidate for Advanced Encryption Standard (AES). Contacts E-mail 2025 at shudo.net shudo at computer.org shudo at acm.org Links Shudo Group, Kyoto University (in Japanese)
